parameters:
\bustMsgExp[1, 1]\nc<Saki>(Whoa! Did he really call a succubus to his house while his
wife is here!? )

\nc<Middle-Aged Man>Thank you for coming all this way. Today, I'd like you to
spend some time with my son.
\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>I see... So you have a son.

\nc<Middle-Aged Woman>Yes. It's quite embarrassing, but our child has been shut
away in his room... He's what you'd call a shut-in.

\nc<Saki>(This is troublesome. I'm not a counselor or anything... It
would be one thing if it was a young child, but...)

\nc<Middle-Aged Man>My son seems to be struggling with social relationships at
school. We were hoping you could spend a little time with
him.

\nc<Saki>Ah, yes. If that's the case...(This is quite different from
what I was expecting, but senpai did say nothing was off-
limits... I guess it can't be helped)
\nc<Middle-Aged Man>Thank you. Can we start right away?

\nc<Saki>Yes! Please take care of me! \bustMsgExp[1, 3](Maybe I can
go home early today)
